pull.title: Drop ParseHashUV in favor of calling ParseHashStr
pull.body:
The one existing call already validates `get_str` will pass via `checkObject`:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13422/files#diff-8fe4d6985ee4acf8bfc1ed8db1e83cb5L586

Split from #13420

issue.title: rpc: Add submitheader
issue.body: This exposes `ProcessNewBlockHeaders` as an rpc called `submitheader`. This can be used to check for invalid block headers and submission of valid block headers via the rpc.

issue.title: rest: Do not re-use the function name ParseHashStr (core_io.h) for a function with different behaviour in rest.cpp
issue.body:
Do not re-use the function name `ParseHashStr` (`core_io.h`) for a function with different behaviour in `rest.cpp`.

Before:

```
src/core_io.h:uint256 ParseHashStr(const std::string&, const std::string& strName);
src/core_read.cpp:uint256 ParseHashStr(const std::string& strHex, const std::string& strName)
src/rest.cpp:static bool ParseHashStr(const std::string& strReq, uint256& v)
```

After:

```
src/core_io.h:uint256 ParseHashStr(const std::string&, const std::string& strName);
src/core_read.cpp:uint256 ParseHashStr(const std::string& strHex, const std::string& strName)
```
